alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:47PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Accomack County through 315 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Onancock, or 13 miles northeast of Exmore, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Rain 1 to 2 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Possible flooding of low lying areas. Locations impacted include... Onancock, Parksley, Onley, Accomac, Melfa, Bloxom, Wachapreague, Keller, Harborton, Locustville, Pungoteague, Clam, Guilford, Tasley and Quinby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
